example[0]: The school trip has become an annual event.
definition[1]: based on or calculated over a period of one year
example[1]: a household with an annual income of $60,000
definition[2]: a plant that lives for one year or season
definition[3]: a book, especially for children, that is produced once a year with the same title but different stories, pictures etc
definition[4]: annual events happen once a year
example[2]: Shareholders can vote at the annual meeting.
definition[5]: calculated over a period of a year
